code: import{useCart}from"../../CartContext/CartContext";import{Images}from"../../Images/Images";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var ProductIPhone=[{id:"1iphone",name:"iPhone",price:1,details:"cok guzel pc",image:Images[0].ImageIphone},{id:"2iphone",name:"iPhone 14 pro max",price:2,details:"cok guzel pc",image:Images[0].ImageIphone},{id:"3iphone",name:"iPhone 14",price:3,details:"cok guzel pc",image:Images[0].ImageIphone},{id:"4iphone",name:"iPhone 13",price:3,details:"cok guzel pc",image:Images[0].ImageIphone},{id:"5iphone",name:"iPhone 13 pro",price:3,details:"cok guzel pc",image:Images[0].ImageIphone},{id:"6iphone",name:"iPhone xs",price:3,details:"cok guzel pc",image:Images[0].ImageIphone}];var CardWatch=function CardWatch(){var _useCart=useCart(),addToCart=_useCart.addToCart;var handleAddToCart=function handleAddToCart(product){addToCart(product);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-container d-flex flex-wrap justify-content-center gap-5",children:ProductIPhone.map(function(product){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",style:{width:"25rem"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,className:"card-img-top",alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"card-title d-flex justify-content-center",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text ",children:["Price: ",product.price," TL"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:["Details: ",product.details]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn btn-danger",onClick:function onClick(){return handleAddToCart(product);},children:"Add to cart"})]})]},product.id);})});};export default CardWatch;
